TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlGenericControl extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl

summary.span: 定义未由特定 .NET Framework 类表示的所有 HTML 服务器控件元素的方法、属性和事件。

span.span: Defines the methods, properties, and events for all HTML server control elements not represented by a specific .NET Framework class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此类用于表示 HTML 服务器控件元素不是直接由.NET Framework 类表示，如``， `
`， ``，或``。Use this class to represent an HTML server control element not directly represented by a .NET Framework class, such as ``, `
`, ``, or ``. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)和[验证用户输入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133) and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来表示``元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to represent the `` element. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlGenericControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlGenericControl Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlGenericControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlGenericControl Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类使用的默认值。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class using the default values. 它通常用于动态创建服务器端``元素。It is commonly used to dynamically create a server-side `` element. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |`TagName`|"分布"的文字字符串。The "span" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的新实例类使用默认构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the class using the default constructor. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlGenericControlDefaultConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlGenericControlDefaultConstructor/CS/htmlgenericcontrolconstructorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlGenericControlDefaultConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlGenericControlDefaultConstructor/VB/htmlgenericcontrolconstructorvb.aspx#1)]

param.span: 要为其创建该类的此实例的元素的名称。

span.span: The name of the element for which this instance of the class is created.

summary.span: 使用指定的标记初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类使用指定的标记。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class using the specified tag. 这样可以动态创建不是直接由.NET Framework 类表示任何 HTML 服务器控件元素。This allows you to dynamically create any HTML server control element not directly represented by a .NET Framework class. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |`TagName`|`tag` 参数的值。The value of the `tag` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 如果`tag`参数是`null`、属性设置为。If the `tag` parameter is `null`, the property is set to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的新实例类使用重载构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the class using the overloaded constructor. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlGenericControlOverloadConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlGenericControlOverloadConstructor/CS/htmlgenericcontrolconstructoroverloadcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlGenericControlOverloadConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlGenericControlOverloadConstructor/VB/htmlgenericcontrolconstructoroverloadvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TagName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置由 控件表示的 HTML 元素的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the HTML element represented by the control.
The tag name of an element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性以编程方式确定的元素名称的 HTML 服务器控件。Use this property to programmatically determine the element name of the HTML server control. 例如，属性为在服务器端``元素包含的值"范围"。For example, the property for a server-side `` element contains the value "span". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式更改为"字体"从"正文"标记名称和备份。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically change a tag name from "Body" to "Font" and back. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlGenericControl.TagName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlGenericControl.TagName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlGenericControl.TagName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlGenericControl.TagName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
